title: CNN Caught Constantly Lying, Unlike Joe Rogan
itunes:title: CNN Caught Constantly Lying, Unlike Joe Rogan
description:
CNN's Brian Stelter lamented that people are increasingly turning to Joe Rogan for information instead of the truth-tellers in the mainstream, corporate media with their large staffs and newsrooms. Except as Jimmy points out CNN's record of truth-telling is spotty, at best. 

Plus a segment on CNN host Jim Acosta's unhinged warmongering over Ukraine and Russia.

Also featuring Stef Zamorano, Kurt Metzger and Mike MacRae! And phone calls from Joe Biden and Alec Baldwin!
